Html:
So I just DLed the latest version of Rawr, and I have an issue displaying the whole application.  My monitor is an HDTV LCD screen that doesn't support any resolutions higher than 1360 x 768.

The problem is the bottom of the application is getting cut off.  I can see all my gear slots except for my bracers and my 2 trinkets.  Can anyone offer any suggestions?
Nope, Rawr2 doesn't support that. Try Rawr3.

It's the classic case of:

You need to be yay high to enter this ride.

In this particular case, that's 760 pixels.  You might get it just visible if you set your task bar to 'auto-hide'.  But the way you describe it, it would also seem that you have set an unusual screen DPI (or at least inappropriate for the already low resolution).
